entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Hinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 p.m. MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
